name: Pawn (itch)
description:
'Pawn' is a game for Leap Motion in which the player leads their hero, or pawn, on an adventure. The Leap Motion allows the player to gesture for their pawn to continue, to stop, and to cast a number of spells in order to protect their lowly hero.

Swipe left to push your pawn onwards. Swipe right to stop them in their tracks.
